typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fcmovies
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fcmovonline
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fcmovieactor
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fcactors
fcmovies, fcmovonline join(SourceSystemMovieID == MovieID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		SourceSystemMovieID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate
	)) ~> Select1
Select1, fcmovieactor join(SourceSystemMovieID == MovieID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		SourceSystemMovieID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		ActorID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate,
		MovieActorID
	)) ~> Select2
Select2, fcactors join(Select2@ActorID == fcactors@ActorID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		SourceSystemMovieID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		ActorID = Select2@ActorID,
		ActorName,
		Gender,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate
	)) ~> Select3
Select3 sink(input(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['catalog.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> fcmoviemerged
